summary: CAR HAULER TRAILER ISSUE #1 THE SCREWS THAT RETAIN GUIDE BUSHINGS ON THE LIFT SYSTEM FALL OUT OR BREAK OFF WHICH ALLOW THE BUSHINGS TO FALL OFF. THIS ALLOWS THE LIFT WITH THE CAR LOADED AND RAISED TO MOVE DURING ACCELERATION, BRAKING AND TURNING.     ISSUE #2 THE 1/4" SCREWS THAT HOLD THE UPRIGHT WHICH GUIDES THE LIFT AS IT MOVES UP OR DOWN STRIP OUT OR COME LOOSE AND FALL DUE TO THE FORCE OF MOVEMENT. THERE ARE ONLY 5 OF THESE SMALL SCREWS ON EACH OF THE 2 UPRIGHTS ON THE DRIVER SIDE. THIS ALLOWS FOR EVEN MORE MOVEMENT WHICH MAY CAUSE THE LIFT WITH A CAR ON IT TO COME LOOSE OR POSSIBLY FALL.     THIS HAPPENS WHEN IN USE TRAVELING ON ROADS. WE WERE ABLE TO MAKE TEMPORARY REPAIRS TO GET HOME. THESE ISSUES HAPPENED SEVERAL TIMES IN THE PAST 2 YEARS.*DT*JB*DT  *AS
